ygData.subject: Re: Role-playing element in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye i m intending to improve my faction not for the sake of good, but rather to fool the pale skinned beings, whom many of you call humans into believing I am
ygData.messageBody:
Aye i'm intending to improve my faction not for the sake of good, but rather
to fool the pale skinned beings, whom many of you call humans into believing
I am fighting for their cause. However, I am loyal only to Innoruuk himself
and for that, I say HAIL INNORUUK. Seeing the humans die shall always be my
joy, however i always welcome another ally in Evil.----->Mondain )
ooc Although the gnomish necro has the best stats, I chose dark elf after
seeing a fully equipped Tier'dal necro wearing full Gossmer armor, not sure
of the spelling who looked really nice . I saw many gnomish warriors wear
armor and they look kinda stumpy hehe.
btw, the human guards in commons won't attack, neither do the guards in
freeport, they are evil. I got a dubious con on most of them, but those with
SIR, u better watch out. They are the self proclaimed paladins and are fools
imho. Innkeepers in commons are KOS to us tho, so if u plan on coming
commons, don't go near them. They are better martial arts expert than the
guards.
Any yes, if possible i would like to wipe out a goody town when i'm very
high level. imagine seeing the bodies of those pale skin beings lying on the
floor in a bloody heap. Yummy )
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 11:05 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Anyone read the recent EQ review in CGW June issue?
>
>It pointed out that EQ is more of a hack and slash RPG while UO has more
>stuffs other than hack & slash. Somehow I agree coz seem like I've
>nothing much to do other than blasting monsters in EQ, hehe. Dunno how
>long can this 'blasting' will last me in EQ ;)
>
>Btw, I'm having a hard time in Steamfont Mountain after my wiz achieve lvl
>5 via soloing, AGAIN. As in Felwithe, I'm having a hard time finding a
>good team to gain XP to higher lvl. 90% of the team I mixed so far sux -
>some members even disband and flee when a train of monsters killed our
>tanks and rushed towards the casters, LOL. (Oh remember the name David,
>this guy looted everything in group hunting and said "who loot also nimnd",
>hehe, and he is always the first one who disband and flee when danger arise
>- his name disappear in group list not becoz he LD but I personally see him
>running off, hehe).
>
>Anyone make a gnomish char? Need a buddy badly there ;) If not, I will
>create a TSK or TSH (someone said we need more cleric/shaman chars in
>Prexus guild?) and solo all the way - ie make the darkest evil char. Kinda
>sian finding pple to team with. Been a lawful good char in UO, maybe it 's
>time to make a chaotic evil one in EQ, wahahahaha!
>
>Btw, Leshrec, need to check with u. Regarding ya DEN, do u intend to
>role-play evil or intend to "turn over a new leave" (ie improve ya faction
>with other races)? Anyone ever think of building a high lvl EVIL char and
>wipe off an npc town? hehehe.
>
>Mondain
>
>
